Construction

At a Glance


Current items to be completed: (please consider a timely donation):

- upstairs carpet

- AV and Computer Equipment

- Furniture (library, study rooms, office)

 

  • Status Update - MAY 2011

    - Colors finalized. Painting underway.

    - Elevator delivered and awaiting installation.

    - Light fixtures installed.

    - Outside landscaping started by student volunteers.

  • Status Update - MARCH 2011

    - Access ramp railing installed.

    - Interior walls installed.

    - Ceiling installed.

  • Status Update - February 2011

    Back and side exterior doors installed .

    Utility lines installed, sidewalk restored.

    1st & 2nd floor wall fire-proofing installed - required wall modifications completed.

    1st & 2nd floor wall sheet rock insulation installed.

    Elevator permit resolved - requires minor elevator pit reconfiguration.

  • Status Update - June 2010

    Fire sprinkler system completed, inspected and approved by city. 

    Data cables and wiring installed.

    Rough setting for sound system installed.

    Back and side doors awaiting delivery and installation.

  • Status Update - MAY 2010

    Permit secured from city, work resumed.

    Front doors installed.

    Utility work to begin on front side-walk. Awaiting Engineering permit.

  • Status Update - April 2010

    Construction temporariy halted on some items in order to renew expiring permits.

    Front doors complete. Awaiting installation.

  • Status Update - MARCH 2010

    Front doors commissioned, expected delivery May 15.

    Low-voltage and electricity wiring completed.

  • Status Update - February 2010

    Roof vent openings closed to comply with fire code.

    Rough wiring for security completed.

  • Status Update - January 2010

    First level floor is nailed down and leveled.

    Roof drainage fire safety re-questioned by city. Alternate solutions explored.

    Disablity access ramp complete.

  • Status Update - December 2009

    First level floor and moisture barrier below are complete.

    Plumbing is complete, city approval issued.

    Second level floor is complete.

    Roof drainage is complete, awaiting city approval.

    Electrical almost complete. Needs programmable switch panels.

    Dedicated phone line established.

    Water protection shed for outside electrical panel installed.

  • Status Update December 2008

    The exterior work on masjid enclosure is complete. Stucco, windows, roof, drainage, etc are all done.

    Scaffolding is removed. Neighbors' fences are restored. One can now truly see the potential this building has to offer!

    Work is ongoing on major systems within the building - fire sprinklers, electrical wiring, and plumbing. To be followed by flooring and interior finishes.

    The finish line is near. We need your help to get there. Please tale a look at the progress and donate generously to help us see this project to completion.
